properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the runtime to use.

type.description: The name of the runtime to use.

properties.name: RuntimeVersion
properties.description: The version of the runtime to use.

type.description: The version of the runtime to use.

properties.name: CachingKeys
properties.description: The caching keys for a resolver that has caching activated. Valid values are entries from the $context.arguments, $context.source, and $context.identity maps.

type.description: The caching keys for a resolver that has caching activated. Valid values are entries from the $context.arguments, $context.source, and $context.identity maps.

properties.name: Ttl
properties.description: The TTL in seconds for a resolver that has caching activated. Valid values are 1-36.00 seconds.

type.description: The TTL in seconds for a resolver that has caching activated. Valid values are 1-36.00 seconds.

LambdaConflictHandlerConfig.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

properties.name: LambdaConflictHandlerArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

properties.name: Functions
properties.description: A list of Function objects.

type.description: A list of Function objects.

properties.name: ConflictDetection
properties.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

type.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

properties.name: ConflictHandler
properties.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

type.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

properties.name: ApiId
properties.description: The AWS AppSync GraphQL API to which you want to attach this resolver.

type.description: The AWS AppSync GraphQL API to which you want to attach this resolver.

properties.name: CachingConfig
properties.description: The caching configuration for the resolver.

type.description: The caching configuration for the resolver.

properties.name: Code
properties.description: The resolver code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required.

type.description: The resolver code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required.

properties.name: CodeS3Location
properties.description: The Amazon S3 endpoint.

type.description: The Amazon S3 endpoint.

properties.name: DataSourceName
properties.description: The resolver data source name.

type.description: The resolver data source name.

properties.name: FieldName
properties.description: The GraphQL field on a type that invokes the resolver.

type.description: The GraphQL field on a type that invokes the resolver.

properties.name: Kind
properties.description: The resolver type.

type.description: The resolver type.

properties.name: MaxBatchSize
properties.description: The maximum number of resolver request inputs that will be sent to a single AWS Lambda function in a BatchInvoke operation.

type.description: The maximum number of resolver request inputs that will be sent to a single AWS Lambda function in a BatchInvoke operation.

properties.name: PipelineConfig
properties.description: Functions linked with the pipeline resolver.

type.description: Functions linked with the pipeline resolver.

properties.name: RequestMappingTemplate
properties.description: Request mapping templates are optional when using a Lambda data source. For all other data sources, a request mapping template is required.

type.description: Request mapping templates are optional when using a Lambda data source. For all other data sources, a request mapping template is required.

properties.name: RequestMappingTemplateS3Location
properties.description: The location of a request mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

type.description: The location of a request mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

properties.name: ResponseMappingTemplate
properties.description: The response mapping template.

type.description: The response mapping template.

properties.name: ResponseMappingTemplateS3Location
properties.description: The location of a response mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

type.description: The location of a response mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

properties.name: Runtime
properties.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified.

type.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified.

properties.name: SyncConfig
properties.description: The SyncConfig for a resolver attached to a versioned data source.

type.description: The SyncConfig for a resolver attached to a versioned data source.

properties.name: TypeName
properties.description: The GraphQL type that invokes this resolver.

type.description: The GraphQL type that invokes this resolver.

properties.name: ResolverArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resolver.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resolver.
